summary: This release brings Grove's components fully into the Svelte ecosystem, replacing React-based elements to deliver a smoother, more cohesive experience. We've enhanced markdown security and resolved key compatibility issues with Cloudflare Workers, making the platform more stable and reliable. Overall, v0.3.3 focuses on polishing the foundation for a faster and more robust blogging platform.

fixes: Bump engine to 0.3.3, use npm version for @groveengine/ui
Build UI package before example-site in CI workflow
Use workspace:* for @groveengine/ui in all packages
Use workspace reference for @groveengine/ui to avoid stale npm version
Replace React sonner with svelte-sonner to fix hydration errors
Expand DOMPurify allowed tags and attributes for markdown content
Remove unsupported --compatibility-flags from wrangler pages deploy
Remove mermaid dependency to resolve Cloudflare Workers crypto issue
